00003 #ifndef _ORTrigger32LiveTimeDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORTrigger32LiveTimeDecoder_hh_
00005 
00006 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 #include "ORVEventCounterDecoder.hh"
00008 
00009 class ORTrigger32LiveTimeDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder, public ORVEventCounterDecoder
00010 {
00011   public:
00012     enum ERunState { kStopRun = 0, kStartRun = 1, kMiddleRun = 3 };
00013     ORTrigger32LiveTimeDecoder() {}
00014     virtual ~ORTrigger32LiveTimeDecoder() {}
00015 
00016     virtual inline UInt_t EventTriggerBitsOf(UInt_t* record)
00017       { return (record[1] & 0x0c000000) >> 24; }
00018     virtual inline UInt_t GTIDOf(UInt_t* record)
00019       { return (record[1] & 0x00ffffff); }
00020     virtual inline ERunState RunStateOf(UInt_t* record)
00021       { return (ERunState) ((record[2] & 0x00030000) >> 16); }
00022     virtual inline UInt_t CrateOf(UInt_t* record)
00023       { return (record[2] & 0x00000f00) >> 8; }
00024     virtual inline UInt_t SlotOf(UInt_t* record)
00025       { return record[2] & 0x0000001f; }
00026 
00027     virtual inline UInt_t TotalLiveTimeTopOf(UInt_t* record)
00028       { return record[3] & 0x000000ff; }
00029     virtual inline UInt_t TotalLiveTimeBottomOf(UInt_t* record)
00030       { return record[4]; }
00031     virtual inline ULong64_t TotalLiveTimeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00032       { return (((ULong64_t) TotalLiveTimeTopOf(record)) << 32) + TotalLiveTimeBottomOf(record); }
00033     virtual inline double GetTotalLiveTime_s(UInt_t* record) 
00034       { return double(TotalLiveTimeOf(record))*1.0e-6; }
00035 
00036     virtual inline UInt_t Trigger1LiveTimeTopOf(UInt_t* record)
00037       { return (record[3] & 0x0000ff00) >> 8; }
00038     virtual inline UInt_t Trigger1LiveTimeBottomOf(UInt_t* record)
00039       { return record[5]; }
00040     virtual inline ULong64_t Trigger1LiveTimeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00041       { return (((ULong64_t) Trigger1LiveTimeTopOf(record)) << 32) + Trigger1LiveTimeBottomOf(record); }
00042     virtual inline double GetTrigger1LiveTime_s(UInt_t* record) 
00043       { return double(Trigger1LiveTimeOf(record))*1.0e-6; }
00044 
00045     virtual inline UInt_t Trigger2LiveTimeTopOf(UInt_t* record)
00046       { return (record[3] & 0x00ff0000) >> 16; }
00047     virtual inline UInt_t Trigger2LiveTimeBottomOf(UInt_t* record)
00048       { return record[6]; }
00049     virtual inline ULong64_t Trigger2LiveTimeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00050       { return (((ULong64_t) Trigger2LiveTimeTopOf(record)) << 32) + Trigger2LiveTimeBottomOf(record); }
00051     virtual inline double GetTrigger2LiveTime_s(UInt_t* record) 
00052       { return double(Trigger2LiveTimeOf(record))*1.0e-6; }
00053 
00054     virtual inline UInt_t ScopeLiveTimeTopOf(UInt_t* record)
00055       { return (record[3] & 0xff000000) >> 24; }
00056     virtual inline UInt_t ScopeLiveTimeBottomOf(UInt_t* record)
00057       { return record[7]; }
00058     virtual inline ULong64_t ScopeLiveTimeOf(UInt_t* record) 
00059       { return (((ULong64_t) ScopeLiveTimeTopOf(record)) << 32) + ScopeLiveTimeBottomOf(record); }
00060     virtual inline double GetScopeLiveTime_s(UInt_t* record) 
00061       { return double(ScopeLiveTimeOf(record))*1.0e-6; }
00062 
00063     // for basic trees
00064     virtual inline size_t GetNPars() { return 13; }
00065     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00066     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/);
00067 
00068     // for event counters
00069     virtual inline size_t GetEventCount(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00070 
00071     virtual inline std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORTrigger32Model:LiveTime"; }
00072 };
